page.description: Often you will want to display a list of values selected from a table. It is often desirable to specifically order these entries, instead of allowing them to display in record order or alphabetically. Here is a technique for solving this problem. This example uses a combo box on a form.

step.description: Select the control that will display the list, right click, and select Properties... .
On the Setup tab select "Combo Box" in the Field-Type list.
Select "Computed Automatically" in the Choices for control are list.
Select "Expression (that returns a CR-LF delimited list) in the Source list.
